title: umA mahEshvari
sahitya:
umA mahEshwarI! tripura sunda

rI! mAdhava sOdhari gauri jagadambA

 

anupallavi

 

kAmAkshI! karuNaik kaDalE! mAngADamarnda

kaumArI! kayilaikkadipan manam kavarnda  

caraNam

 

panniru kai vElanai InRa en tAyE!

enniru kai unait tozhum varamum tandAyE!

mannuyir nalam vENDi kaDum tavamum Endi

tannigar illAmal tigazhum naLinakAnti
